connection.title: 서버에 연결
connection.savedServersHelp: Select a server to connect, or click Edit to load into the form.
connection.selectProtocolPrompt: Select a protocol above to configure your connection
connection.aerocloudConfigured: AeroCloud is already configured and syncing
connection.aerocloudDesc: Turn any FTP server into your personal cloud with automatic sync
connection.aerocloudHelp: You can also configure AeroCloud from the status bar
connection.selectProviderPrompt: Select a provider above or choose "Custom" for manual configuration
connection.securityKeyring: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] OS Keyring storage (libsecret on Linux, Keychain on macOS, Credential Manager on Windows)
connection.securityEncryption: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] AES-256-GCM encryption with Argon2id key derivation for local storage
connection.securityNoSend: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Credentials never leave your device — no cloud sync, no telemetry
connection.securityTLS: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] All connections use TLS 1.3 / SSH encryption when available

contextMenu.enterArchivePassword: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] This archive is encrypted. Enter password:
contextMenu.wrongPassword: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Wrong password or corrupted archive
contextMenu.encryptionOptionalHint: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Leave empty for no encryption
contextMenu.importMegaPrompt: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Paste a MEGA public link to import:
contextMenu.shareLinkMoment: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] This may take a moment
contextMenu.shareLinkFailed: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Failed to create share link

settings.title: 설정
settings.restartRequired: 전체 적용을 위해 재시작이 필요할 수 있습니다
settings.showStatusBarDesc: Display connection info and statistics at the bottom
settings.showSystemMenuBarDesc: Show the native File/Edit/View menu at the top of the window
settings.toastNotificationsDesc: Display popup notifications for actions (errors always shown). Activity Log is always available.
settings.analyticsDesc: 앱 버전, 언어, OS를 공유하여 AeroFTP 개선에 도움을 주세요. 개인 데이터나 서버 정보는 수집되지 않습니다.
settings.securityOAuth: OAuth 토큰은 안전한 파일 저장소를 사용합니다
settings.securityNoSend: 자격 증명은 외부 서버로 전송되지 않습니다
settings.securityTLS: 모든 연결은 가능한 경우 암호화를 사용합니다
settings.masterPasswordDesc: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Protect AeroFTP with a master password. The app will lock after inactivity and require your password to unlock.
settings.autoLockDesc: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Lock the app automatically after this period of inactivity (0 = disabled)
settings.passwordRequirements: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Minimum 8 characters. Use a mix of letters, numbers, and symbols for best security.
settings.enterCurrentPassword: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Please enter your current password
settings.confirmRemovePassword: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Are you sure you want to remove master password protection? Your credentials will still be stored securely, but the app will no longer require a password to open.
settings.securityArgon2: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Argon2id key derivation (128 MiB memory, 4 iterations)
settings.securityZeroize: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Automatic memory zeroization on lock
settings.oauthNote: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] OAuth2 credentials are stored locally in your encrypted vault and never sent to AeroFTP servers.
settings.appBackgroundPatternDesc: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Choose a subtle pattern for the main app background
settings.exportKeystoreDesc: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Export all encrypted credentials to a backup file
settings.importKeystoreDesc: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Import credentials from a backup file
settings.migrationDesc: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] AeroFTP found unencrypted data that should be moved to the encrypted vault for maximum security.

toast.connectionLost: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Connection lost, attempting to reconnect
toast.connectionLostManual: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Could not reconnect. Please reconnect manually.
toast.fillEndpointCreds: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Please fill in endpoint and credentials
toast.fillBucket: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Please fill in bucket name
toast.fillServerUser: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Please fill in server and username
toast.saveServerFirst: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Please save your server first
toast.generateShareLinkFailed: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Failed to generate share link
toast.batchRenamePartial: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Batch rename completed with errors

about.tagline: FTP 그 이상. 완벽한 개발자 툴킷.

support.title: AeroFTP 지원
support.subtitle: 여러분의 지원이 AeroFTP를 무료로 유지하는 데 도움이 됩니다!

protocol.sshAuthHelp: 비밀번호 사용 시 공란. 키 사용 시 경로 입력.
protocol.webdavNote: WebDAV 경로는 전체 경로를 포함해야 합니다.
protocol.ftpWarningDesc: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] FTP transmits credentials and data in plain text. Consider using FTPS or SFTP for a secure connection.
protocol.encryptionExplicit: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Require explicit FTP over TLS
protocol.encryptionImplicit: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Require implicit FTP over TLS
protocol.encryptionExplicitIfAvailable: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Use explicit FTP over TLS if available
protocol.acceptInvalidCerts: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Accept invalid or self-signed certificates

migration.title: Secure Credential Migration
migration.warning: Your credentials are stored in plaintext
migration.warningDetail: Passwords and tokens will be migrated to your OS keychain for secure storage.
migration.keyringDetected: OS Keychain detected - credentials will be securely stored
migration.vaultMode: Using encrypted vault with master password
migration.skipWarning: Skipping will leave your credentials in plaintext files

masterPassword.setupInfo: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Your credentials are already encrypted. The master password adds an extra layer of protection — you'll need to enter it when the app starts or after inactivity.

syncPanel.title: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Synchronize Files
syncPanel.descRemoteToLocal: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Checks which remote files are newer and downloads them to the local folder.
syncPanel.descLocalToRemote: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Checks which local files are newer and uploads them to the remote server.
syncPanel.descBidirectional: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Checks differences in both directions: downloads newer remote files and uploads newer local files.
syncPanel.clickCompare: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Click "Compare Now" to scan for differences
syncPanel.indexAvailableTooltip: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] A sync index from a previous sync is available — conflict detection is enhanced

ui.editPathNav: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Click to edit path, Enter to navigate
ui.localPathMismatch: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Local path doesn't match the connected server

ai.askPlaceholder: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Ask anything... (Shift+Enter for new line)
ai.speechNotSupported: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Speech recognition is not supported in this browser.
ai.disclaimer: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] AI may make mistakes. Double-check code.
ai.welcome: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Your AI-powered FTP assistant. I can help you manage files, analyze code, and execute operations.
ai.noModelSelected: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] No model selected. Click ⚙️ to configure a provider.
ai.noProvidersConfigured: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] No AI providers configured. Click ⚙️ to add one.
ai.apiKeyNotConfigured: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] API key not configured for {{provider}}. Open AI Settings to add one.
ai.rateLimitReached: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Rate limit reached for {{provider}}. Try again in {{seconds}}s.
ai.errorAuth: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Authentication failed. Check your API key in AI Settings.
ai.errorRateLimit: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Rate limited by the provider. Wait a moment and try again.
ai.errorModelNotFound: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Model not found. Check your model name in AI Settings.
ai.errorNetwork: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Network error. Check your internet connection and provider URL.
ai.errorDefault: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Make sure you have configured an AI provider in settings.
ai.executeApproval: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] I want to execute **{{tool}}**. Approve or cancel:

settings.title: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] AI Settings
settings.addProviderHint: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Add a provider above to get started
settings.addProviderFirst: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Add a provider first to manage models
settings.autoRoutingDescription: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Automatically select the best model for each task type
settings.autoRoutingInstruction: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Configure which model to use for each task type. When auto-routing is enabled, the AI will automatically select the appropriate model based on the task.
settings.codeGenerationDesc: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Writing new code, functions, components
settings.fileAnalysisDesc: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Analyzing file contents, understanding code
settings.autoRoutingTip: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Tip: Leave as "Auto (Default)" to use the model selected in the chat header. Configure specific models only when you want different models for different tasks.
settings.advancedDescription: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Configure advanced AI parameters for response generation.
settings.styleHelp: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Precise = factual responses. Creative = more imaginative. Balanced = default.
settings.maxResponseHelp: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Higher values allow longer responses but use more API credits.
settings.noModelsFound: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] No models found. Is Ollama running?
settings.promptReset: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] System prompt reset to default
settings.promptPlaceholder: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Enter custom instructions for AeroAgent...
settings.pluginsDesc: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Extend AeroAgent with custom tools
settings.pluginCreateHint: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Create a folder with a plugin.json manifest in the plugins directory

codeBlock.diffNoFile: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] No file open for diff

templates.analyzeUi: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Analyze UI screenshot for layout, accessibility, and UX issues
templates.performance: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Analyze code for performance bottlenecks and optimization

geminiCache.title: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Context Caching
geminiCache.description: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Large system prompts and contexts (32K+ tokens) are automatically cached for 5 minutes, reducing latency and cost by up to 75% on subsequent requests.

webSearch.title: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Web Search
webSearch.description: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Allow the AI to search the web for current information. Supported by Kimi (Moonshot) and Qwen (Alibaba).
webSearch.providerNote: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Only active when using Kimi or Qwen providers. Other providers ignore this setting.

vault.title: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] AeroVault
vault.description: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] AeroVault lets you create AES-256 encrypted containers to securely store your files.
vault.passwordTooShort: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Password must be at least 8 characters
vault.empty: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] Vault is empty. Add files to get started.
vault.descriptionV2: [NEEDS TRANSLATION] AeroVault v2 provides military-grade encryption with nonce misuse-resistant AES-256-GCM-SIV and optional cascade encryption.
